name: Skill Focus
text: Choose a skill. You are particularly adept at that skill.
benefit: You get a +3 bonus on all checks involving the chosen skill. If you have 10 or more ranks in that skill, this bonus increases to +6.
special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new skill.
mythicText: You mastery with this skill is unmatched, even in difficult situations.
mythicBenefit: You can always take 10 or 20 on checks with your choice of skill for Skill Focus, even when you are rushed or threatened.
mythicSpecial: You can gain this feat multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, it applies to a different non-mythic Skill Focus feat.
text_zh: 选择一项技能。你特别擅长该技能。
benefit_zh: 你在所有涉及该技能的检定上获得+3加值。如果你该技能的等级为10或更高，此加值提升为+6。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取此专长。其效果不叠加。每次你获得此专长时，它作用于一种新技能。
mythicText_zh: 即便在危机的情况下，你也能够熟练地使用技能。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你总是能在使用技能专攻专长中选择的技能时，在检定中进行取10或者取20，即便在仓促（rushed）或受到威胁（threatened）的情况下。
mythicSpecial_zh: 你能够多次选取该专长。其效果不会叠加。每当你选取该专长时，它都会应用到不同的非神话版技能专攻专长上。
